title2: I'm Saleh. I build things for the web
title3: Aloha ðŸ‘‹ I'm Saleh. I build things for the web
p1: My name is pronounced the way it is spelled, so you're most probably getting it right, but in case you're not, no worries I understand it's not an easy name for non-arabic speakers
p2: I was born and raised in Riyadh and currently live in ðŸ—½NYCðŸ—½ where I work as a software engineer. I really enjoy computering and the prospects of positive change that are possible with the advancement of technology to make the world a better, more just place
p3: Besides tech, I spend a lot of time around mountains and books. I think the vast majority of my worldviews and personality come from travelling. I also love exploring new places and new things and new ideas and climbing trees and seeing my friends and making new ones and watching movies and tutoring kids. I'd say most of the time I'm usually doing one of those things. And I also pretend to speak french and a few other languages
p4: I don't use social media, but I'd be very happy to connect over email
